subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Scott Hartnell’s third power-play goal Saturday night broke a tie, completed his second hat trick of the month and carried the Philadelphia Flyers to a 5-3 comeback victory over the host Islanders.
snippet: Scott Hartnell’s third power-play goal Saturday night broke a tie, completed his second hat trick of the month and carried the Philadelphia Flyers to a 5-3 comeback victory over the host Islanders.
